title: What if League had an Aghanim's Scepter ?
body:
For those of you'll who do not know, DOTA 2 has an item known as Aghanim's Scepter that upgrades an ability (usually ultimate) by giving it bonus effects or straight up increasing the damage it does.  

http://dota2.gamepedia.com/Aghanim%27s_Scepter

Here are my thoughts on if league got the item (or a similar one) as well

{{champion:134}} : Spheres stay for 2 seconds longer and the sphere cap on her ultimate is removed.
{{champion:37}} : Allies near her get all of her aura bonuses when she ults, it stacks with auras gained previously and any auras they will gain from her later. 
{{champion:99}} : Enemies near her or in her ultimate get blinded for 1-2 seconds when she ults. 
{{champion:40}} : Monsoon leaves behind a thunderstorm that damages enemies that walk into the AOE.

replies.body:
{{champion:432}} : Allies can now move and cast spells during Tempered Fate, but still have all the bonuses of Stasis.
{{champion:136}} : Gain 3 additional stars.
{{champion:115}} : Increase the range of Mega Inferno Bomb to become Global and the full damage is now applied in all of the area of effect.
{{champion:68}} : Gain the Danger Zone effect 'Increase the damage and slow amount by 50%' on The Equalizer
{{champion:33}} : Tremors now stuns enemies hit for 1/1.25/1.5 seconds. Can only happen once per cast.
{{champion:27}} : Insanity Potion is now a passive stat boost.
All of them seem fine except the bard one, which seems a little busted. Aurelion's is up there too but not as bad.
Viktor once again getting his ideas stolen? Poor guy.
Well, you could give him the option to upgrade any of his abilities once more.....I don't play him enough to know what can work.....
